Posts.Content: rellaton wrote: for the past few months seem to be soiling myself without even knowing it.Â  Just streaks and spots mostly no major accidents (thank goodness) It reminds me of being pre menopausal and having a constant discharge that requires you to wear a pantiliner - I think this is a very weird side effect of pelvic rads that I had at the beginning of the year. Just wondering if this has this happened to anyone else? Am I the luck only one? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: soiling/maybe pelvic rads side effect? rellaton heatherpalmerton
